title: 619 - Home Alone | Tale of the Tape
description:
Will Scoots remember Kevin’s name or will he just ramble about Macaulay Culkin and Ryan Gosling memeing shirts? Either way you’ll be able to drift off to dreamland. (movie talk about 17:20)

Commission a Song from Jonathan Mann @ song.jonathanmann.net

Get your tickets to Podcon here https://podcon.com/

and use the promo code "sleep" for 10% off your tickets!

Come see us in person at PodCon in Seattle, December 9-10! You can see what we’ll be doing, check out who else will be there, and snag tickets at podcon.com.

Make sure to listen to "The Bright Sessions” by Lauren Shippen http://www.thebrightsessions.com/
